Product: MSI PRO MP341CQ 34-Inch 2K UWQHD 3440x1440 Computer Monitor - Professional Curved LED Monitor with 100Hz Refresh Rate, Anti-Glare & Anti-Flicker Technology PC Monitor for Desktop, VESA Mount (Black)
Title: Belle ecranBeautiful screen
Review: Pour une utilisation bureautique, en remplacement de 2 écrans, c'est bien plus confortable, un plus grand espace de travail pour afficher presque l'équivalent de 3 écrans.34" = plutôt du 24" extra large (hauteur plus faible qu'un 27"), ce qui va très bien pour de la bureautique.Faire attention a la largeur, ca prend quand même de la place. La courbure de l'ecran est optimum pour moi (1500R).Définition qui va bien, 100hz qui ne fatigue pas les yeux, et calibration de base tres correct pour de la photo (et ca marche avec du macbook)For office use, replacing 2 screens, it's much more comfortable, a larger workspace to display almost the equivalent of 3 screens. 34" = rather 24" extra wide (lower height than a 27"), which is very good for office automation. Pay attention to the width, it still takes up space. The curvature of the screen is optimal for me (1500R). Definition that goes well, 100hz that does not tire your eyes, and very correct basic calibration for photography (and it works with a Macbook)

Product: MSI PRO MP341CQ 34-Inch 2K UWQHD 3440x1440 Computer Monitor - Professional Curved LED Monitor with 100Hz Refresh Rate, Anti-Glare & Anti-Flicker Technology PC Monitor for Desktop, VESA Mount (Black)
Title: Buen monitor con sonido lamentableGood monitor with regrettable sound
Review: Creo que el titulo lo dice todo.El monitor es cómodo, confortable, con buena resolución, buena tasa de refresco, velocidad y color.El sonido es sencillamente LAMENTABLE.Vengo de un LG también ultawide, y si bien el sonido no era de HiFi, era infinitamente mejor.Le pongo solo 4 estrellas por esto, porque para esa castaña de sonido, podían haberse ahorrado los altavoces.Lo que he hecho ha sido usar la salida de auriculares del propio monitor para conectar una barra de sonido de Trust, baratita, y la diferencia es como de la noche al día.Por lo demás el monitor vale la pena.I think the title says it all. The monitor is comfortable, comfortable, with good resolution, good refresh rate, speed and color. The sound is simply REGRETTABLE. I also come from an LG ultawide, and although the sound wasn't HiFi, it was infinitely better. I give it only 4 stars for this, because for that chestnut of sound, the speakers could have been saved. What I did was use the headphone output of the monitor itself to connect a cheap Trust soundbar, and the difference is like from night to day. Otherwise the monitor is worth it.

Title: PerfectaPerfecta
Review: La hemos comprado para un escritorio bastante largo, para poder trabajar en una sola pantalla con dos cosas a la vez, porque nos resulta incómodo tener dos pantallas. En mi MacBook Air 2024 M3 no conecta, dice que no lo soporta, pero en un HP gaming y en un sobremesa sí conecta sin problemas. Al principio es un poco mareante para quien no está acostumbrado a una pantalla tan larga y curva, pero después perfecto.We bought it for a fairly long desk, to be able to work on a single screen with two things at once, because it's uncomfortable for us to have two screens. On my MacBook Air 2024 M3 it doesn't connect, it says it doesn't support it, but on an HP gaming and a desktop it does connect without problems. At first it's a bit dizzy for those who aren't used to such a long and curved screen, but then perfect.

Product: MSI PRO MP341CQ 34-Inch 2K UWQHD 3440x1440 Computer Monitor - Professional Curved LED Monitor with 100Hz Refresh Rate, Anti-Glare & Anti-Flicker Technology PC Monitor for Desktop, VESA Mount (Black)
Title: Servizio buono, ma Consegna Lieve RitardoGood service, but Slight Delay Delivery
Review: Desidero esprimere la mia soddisfazione per il servizio del venditore, che ha prontamente sostituito il monitor difettoso e ha coperto le spese di spedizione. È importante comprendere che situazioni come queste possono verificarsi, e la gestione del problema è stata impeccabile. Il monitor corrisponde esattamente alle specifiche tecniche indicate ed è particolarmente adatto per chi necessita di un dispositivo performante per il multitasking e per sessioni prolungate di utilizzo. Tuttavia, do tre stelle perché la consegna è avvenuta con un giorno di ritardo rispetto alla data prevista, un aspetto che potrebbe essere migliorato.I would like to express my satisfaction with the seller's service, who promptly replaced the faulty monitor and covered the shipping costs. It's important to understand that situations like these can occur, and the handling of the issue has been impeccable. The monitor corresponds exactly to the technical specifications indicated and is particularly suitable for those who need a high-performance device for multitasking and for extended sessions of use. However, I give three stars because the delivery was one day late compared to the scheduled date, an aspect that could be improved.

Product: MSI PRO MP341CQ 34-Inch 2K UWQHD 3440x1440 Computer Monitor - Professional Curved LED Monitor with 100Hz Refresh Rate, Anti-Glare & Anti-Flicker Technology PC Monitor for Desktop, VESA Mount (Black)
Title: Vale al penaIt's worth it
Review: E la mia prima esperienza con un monitor curvo e devo ammettere che non tornerò più al monitor tradizionale. Detto questo il prodotto sembra buono , per i colori ho dovuto smanettare un pochino con i settaggi del pc ma questo dipende sempre  dalla scheda video installata e dal gusto personale. Peccato che non abbia delle regolazioni del colore proprie e i pulsanti messi dietro lo schermo sono abbastanza scomodi. Preferisco i comandi classici messi sul frontale.This is my first experience with a curved monitor and I must admit that I will never go back to the traditional monitor. Having said that, the product looks good, for the colors I had to fiddle a little with the PC settings but this always depends on the video card installed and on personal taste. Too bad it doesn't have its own color adjustments and the buttons placed behind the screen are quite uncomfortable. I prefer the classic controls placed on the front.

Product: MSI PRO MP341CQ 34-Inch 2K UWQHD 3440x1440 Computer Monitor - Professional Curved LED Monitor with 100Hz Refresh Rate, Anti-Glare & Anti-Flicker Technology PC Monitor for Desktop, VESA Mount (Black)
Title: Image de qualité, et écran largeHigh-quality picture, and large screen
Review: Cet écran 21:9 en vaudrait presque 2 à lui seul !Sa largeur offre une surface de travail équivalente à celle de deux écrans en un seul, sans la moindre séparation au milieu. Cela rend le multitâche beaucoup plus fluide et agréable.Cet écran répond parfaitement à mes attentes.La qualité d'image est également très bonne, avec des couleurs vives et des détails nets.That 21:9 screen alone would be worth almost 2! Its width offers a work surface equivalent to that of two screens in one, without any separation in the middle. It makes multitasking a lot smoother and more enjoyable. This screen perfectly meets my expectations. The picture quality is also very good, with bright colors and sharp details.

Title: Top levelTop Level

Product: MSI PRO MP341CQ 34-Inch 2K UWQHD 3440x1440 Computer Monitor - Professional Curved LED Monitor with 100Hz Refresh Rate, Anti-Glare & Anti-Flicker Technology PC Monitor for Desktop, VESA Mount (Black)
Title: Buen monitor. Mala experienciaGood monitor. Bad experience
Review: Sobre el monitor, es un 10 para trabajar. Lo de la mala experiencia es debido a que al mes de estar utilizándolo dejó de dar imagen. Se encendía, reconocía que estaba conectado, pero no emitía ninguna imagen. Ni siquiera la del menú de opciones. Tras discutirlo con el vendedor y con Amazon, pude devolverlo. Salvo por este incidente, es muy buen monitor. Puedes configurar la imagen a tu gusto. Viene con un programa para trabajar con pantalla dividida, pero es mejor usar PowertToys que da muchas más opciones en Windows.On the monitor, it's a 10 to work with. The bad experience is because a month after using it, it stopped giving an image. It would turn on, recognize that it was connected, but it wouldn't emit any images. Not even the one in the options menu. After discussing it with the seller and with Amazon, I was able to return it. Except for this incident, it's a very good monitor. You can configure the image to your liking. It comes with a program for working with split screen, but it's better to use PowerTToys, which gives much more options in Windows.

Product: MSI PRO MP341CQ 34-Inch 2K UWQHD 3440x1440 Computer Monitor - Professional Curved LED Monitor with 100Hz Refresh Rate, Anti-Glare & Anti-Flicker Technology PC Monitor for Desktop, VESA Mount (Black)
Title: ottimo rapporto qualità/prezzoexcellent quality/price ratio
Review: Monitor tutto fare, che così come non eccelle in nessun aspetto, non delude neanche sotto nessun di questi.Per il prezzo di acquisto che ha, offre una generale qualità su vari applicativi, dall'uso office/scuola all'uso gaming.Se ci si aspetta un monitor che sia in grado di eccellere in qualche settore, allora bisogna virare su altri prodotti con altri prezzi decisamente più alti.Mio figlio, il fruitore del monitor, è molto soddisfatto ed ora lamenta una migliore scheda video per sfruttare al meglio la risoluzione dello stesso. Ora è abbinato ad una "vecchia" RX 580 4MB che presto o tardi verrà sostituita con qualcosa di più recenteAll-in-one monitor, which just as it does not excel in any aspect, does not disappoint even under any of these. For the purchase price it has, it offers general quality on various applications, from office/school use to gaming use. If you expect a monitor that will be able to excel in some sector, then you have to focus on other products with other, much higher prices. My son, the user of the monitor, is very satisfied and now complains of a better video card to make the most of the resolution of the monitor. Now it is combined with an “old” RX 580 4MB that will sooner or later be replaced with something newer

No echaré de menos el formato común y es mi primer 21:9 el cual ha demostrado ser muy eficiente.I will not use it for gaming. I'll use it for teleworking and with a MacBook Pro. The refresh rate is very good. The image quality is the same. I won't miss the common format and it's my first 21:9 which has proven to be very efficient.

Product: MSI PRO MP341CQ 34-Inch 2K UWQHD 3440x1440 Computer Monitor - Professional Curved LED Monitor with 100Hz Refresh Rate, Anti-Glare & Anti-Flicker Technology PC Monitor for Desktop, VESA Mount (Black)
Title: ses kalitesi iyi değil / görüntü mük!The sound quality is not good/the picture is dull!
Review: monitörü alırken aynı zamanda harici ufak speakerlardan kurtulurum diye düşünüyordum ama ekrana takılı ses sistemi gerçekten kötü. yorumlarda görmüştüm ama msi bu ya gerçek değildir demiştim..onun dışında ekran ayakları pek sağlam ya da devrilmesin diye esnek bilemedim. görüntü kalitesi harika, hem oyun hem de tasarım her türlü işinizi görür. ekranın geniş olması bir iki farklı ekrandan kurtarıyor. beyaz plastik zamanla sararır diye düşünerek siyah aldım :)I was thinking that I would also get rid of the external small speakers when buying the monitor, but the sound system attached to the screen is really bad. I saw it in the comments but msi I said either this is not real.. apart from that, I couldn't figure out how flexible the screen legs are so sturdy or they don't tip over. the image quality is great, both gaming and design do your job. the fact that the screen is large saves you from one or two different screens. i bought black thinking the white plastic would turn yellow over time:)

Product: MSI PRO MP341CQ 34-Inch 2K UWQHD 3440x1440 Computer Monitor - Professional Curved LED Monitor with 100Hz Refresh Rate, Anti-Glare & Anti-Flicker Technology PC Monitor for Desktop, VESA Mount (Black)
Title: Productividad y CalidadProductivity and Quality
Review: Mi reseña se resume en: "ojalá haberte conocido antes"En mi caso, que teletrabajo y tengo que emplear múltiples ventanas, hasta ahora utilizaba doble pantalla, pero era un poco engorro.Ya con este pedazo de monitor se acabó, tengo todo unificado y, por supuesto, se ve a máxima calidad.De esas compras que dices, "esto si que merece la pena".My review can be summed up as: “I wish I had met you before”   In my case, because I work remotely and have to use multiple windows, until now I used a double screen, but it was a bit of a hassle. This piece of monitor is over now, I have everything unified and, of course, it looks at the highest quality. Of those purchases that you say, “this is really worth it”.

Product: MSI PRO MP341CQ 34-Inch 2K UWQHD 3440x1440 Computer Monitor - Professional Curved LED Monitor with 100Hz Refresh Rate, Anti-Glare & Anti-Flicker Technology PC Monitor for Desktop, VESA Mount (Black)
Title: OSD non all’altezza.OSD is not up to par.
Review: A parte il pesantissimo clouding dello schermo che lo rendono inusabile al buio (ed essendo un VA è l'unico motivo per cui l'ho comprato), il motivo principale che mi fa lasciare una stella è l'OSD che si ritrova. Ha pochissime impostazioni (tra cui la modifica dell'aspect ratio bloccata che su un 21:9 non è il massimo, portando qualsiasi segnale diverso dal succitato ad essere deformato senza possibilità di un setup ad hoc), e indicazioni dei pulsanti a schermo che non coincidono con quelli fisici, portando a sbagliare spesso e volentieri nella navigazione. È come se avessero usato l'OSD da un altro modello senza fare le dovute modifiche.Non ho neanche fatto i classici test con il calibro, per me è inutilizzabile e molto limitato dal suo OSD, ho dovuto fare necessariamente il reso.Se invece cercate un monitor da collegare senza toccare nessuna impostazione se non quella della luminosità, potete farci un pensiero.Apart from the very heavy clouding of the screen that makes it unusable in the dark (and being a VA is the only reason I bought it), the main reason that makes me leave a star is the OSD that is found. It has very few settings (including the modification of the blocked aspect ratio, which is not the best on 21:9, leading any signal other than the one mentioned above to be deformed without the possibility of an ad hoc setup), and indications of the on-screen buttons that do not coincide with the physical ones, leading to errors often and willingly in navigation. It is as if they had used the OSD from another model without making the necessary changes. I haven't even done the classic tests with the caliber, for me it's unusable and very limited by its OSD, I necessarily had to do the return. If, on the other hand, you are looking for a monitor to connect without touching any setting other than the brightness setting, you can think about it.

Product: MSI PRO MP341CQ 34-Inch 2K UWQHD 3440x1440 Computer Monitor - Professional Curved LED Monitor with 100Hz Refresh Rate, Anti-Glare & Anti-Flicker Technology PC Monitor for Desktop, VESA Mount (Black)
Title: Monitor defectuosoDefective monitor
Review:
The media could not be loaded.
                
            
                
            
            
        
    
    








  
    Tiene un buen tamaño pudiendo hacer las veces de dos monitores en paralelo. Muy cómodo para programar.Lamentablemente no lo he podido probar. Tras conectarlo al PC han empezado a salir líneas verticales y horizontales en forma de ruido. He probado con otro cable que tenía por casa y en ambos puertos HDMI con el mismo resultado.Al encenderlo y apagarlo (sin estar enchufado) también aparecían, por lo que se debe a un fallo del monitor, no de cables o conectores.He pedido la devolución y no voy a volver a comprarlo. Me decantaré por un monitor de otra marca aunque sea más caro.It has a good size and can act as two monitors in parallel. Very convenient to program. Unfortunately I haven't been able to test it. After connecting it to the PC, vertical and horizontal lines started to appear in the form of noise. I tried another cable that I had around the house and on both HDMI ports with the same result. When it was turned on and off (without being plugged in) they also appeared, so it was due to a failure of the monitor, not of cables or connectors. I asked for a return and will not buy it again. I will opt for a monitor from another brand even if it is more expensive.

Title: Malisima calidad de imagenVery poor image quality
Review: Esta pantalla carece de calidad. Al final la devolví y compra otra pantalla de la marca DELL incluso más barata y con mucha más calidad de imagen. El MSI no solo tiene mala calidad pero incluso los contrastes son molestosos a la vista. Estuve cambiando la configuración varias veces sin remedio.This screen lacks quality. In the end, I returned it and bought another DELL screen that was even cheaper and with much better image quality. Not only does the MSI have poor quality, but even the contrasts are annoying to look at. I was changing the settings several times hopelessly.

Title: Fallo graveSerious misconduct
Review: Estaba deseando que llegara mi monitor y llevo con 3 tornillos en vez de 4, así que no pude montarlo con el trastorno oportuno.Gestión de la recogida y comportamiento de Amazon bueno.I was looking forward to my monitor and I have 3 screws instead of 4, so I couldn't assemble it with the right disorder. Collection management and good Amazon behavior.
